equitable energy access.Description: Renewable energy sources such as solar and wind power can provide affordable and sustainable energy access to underserved communities.
Energy-efficient technologies and practices can help improve access to energy by reducing energy consumption and lowering costs.
Investments in rural electrification infrastructure can ensure equitable energy access for remote and marginalized communities.
Effective policies and regulations play a crucial role in promoting equitable energy access by incentivizing investments and ensuring fair distribution.
